name: ed25519_dalek
author: hazae41
description: WebAssembly port of Ed25519_dalek, a Rust implementation of Ed25519 signatures

scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && rimraf pkg && wasm-pack build --target web --release
scripts.build:package: rimraf dist && deno run -A build.ts && bunchee -m ./src/index.ts && ttsc
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:opt && npm run build:package
